description.value: A well-balanced sword designed for both one-handed and two-handed use, featuring a cruciform hilt and straight double-edged blade. The pommel and crossguard enable bludgeoning techniques (half-swording and the murder stroke). This category includes arming swords, bastard swords, hand-and-a-half swords, and similar versatile medieval blades. The quintessential knightly weapon, offering tactical flexibility.
